channel.title: eda on Barefoot Rob

item.title: eat a lunch with Eda
item.description: 18:40 Tuesday 24 November 2015 JST Eda invited me to lunch in exchange for helping her with questions about her new (first) smartphone. She’s pretty smart herself, so she figured most of it out in between the time we arranged the lunch and had the lunch, but we still enjoyed the lunch a bunch, chatting about cats and such, plus a couple questions about which she had no hunch.
